name: flame-plate
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Fire moves by 20%. Held by a Multitype Pokémon: Holder’s type becomes Fire.
short_effect: Held: Fire-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Changes Arceus’s and Judgment’s type to Fire.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Fire-type moves.
